Uses of Interface
sheep.game.SpriteContainer

Packages that use SpriteContainer
sheep.collision Contains classes for collision detection, spatial partitioning and interfaces for collision events. 
sheep.game Contains classes related to game logic. 
 

Uses of SpriteContainer in sheep.collision
 

Classes in sheep.collision that implement SpriteContainer
 class CollisionLayer
          A layer which contains Sprites and generates collisions between them, but without the overhead a spatial partitioning.
 class Quad
          The node in the QuadTree.
 class SpatialLayer
          A layer which can partition sprites according to a Spatial implementor.
